title: Hlaingbwe
text: Hlaingbwe (<a href="Eastern%20Pwo%20language">Phlone</a> ; , ,; spelled "Loo pleh") is a <a href="town">town</a> in <a href="Kayin%20State">Kayin State</a>, <a href="Myanmar">Myanmar</a>, located on the <a href="Hlaingbwe%20River">Hlaingbwe River</a>, which runs from north to south through the town. Most residents are from the <a href="Karen%20people">Karen ethnic group</a>.
